channel.title: 99 range
channel.description:
I have 23k red chins and im chinning at ape atoll, ive got 83 range right now..
what level will 23k chins get me with 83 and how many chins will i need for 99 from 83 do you think?
Thanks

item.title: 99 range
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:13, topic:362826”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=459103.msg3359821#msg3359821 date=1286243603]
You can get Tzhaar NPCs as slayer tasks right?

If so, train slayer at the same time.
[/quote]

Only from Kuradal, and from my own experience, they aren’t a common task. You need to get the fight caves challenge then decline it. She only assigns like 50-150 too, so it’s hardly worth it.[/quote]

Hmm, okay

Thanks for everyones posts! I might do tzhaar for awhile, maybe ill try to get onyx from shop or something =p

Read full topic

item.title: 99 range
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:12, topic:362826”]You can get Tzhaar NPCs as slayer tasks right?

If so, train slayer at the same time.[/quote]

Only from Kuradal, and from my own experience, they aren’t a common task. You need to get the fight caves challenge then decline it. She only assigns like 50-150 too, so it’s hardly worth it.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 range
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

You can get Tzhaar NPCs as slayer tasks right?

If so, train slayer at the same time.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 range
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Wouldn’t it be better to use regular chins instead of red chins? (cost efficient, anyway) The xp difference isn’t that bad either (~30k or so per hour).

A friend of mine got 95-99 range on regular chins (no void equipment) for only 7-8mil, around 180-220k xp per hour.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 range
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:8, topic:362826”]I don’t really have experience here, but I agree with the others. You probably should get halfway to 99 (~92-93) before using chins. It’ll save a lot of money in the long-run. Plus, if you follow what rip4d said, you’d make upwards of 50m from tzhaar, easily paying for the chins to 99. I think that’s a good deal. :D[/quote]don’t forget about the other things in TzHaar, such as a bank, nice players (usually), and not so much competition at all easily my favorite area in all of RS

Read full topic

item.title: 99 range
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:7, topic:362826”][quote author=Spades link=topic=459103.msg3359604#msg3359604 date=1286233422]
I trained at Tzhaar from 30-75 from 75-88 I trained at Steel/Iron dragons from 88-99 which was about a year ago cost me over 50M in chins and pots. I earned it all back but I pked for it all back, I earned it back within a week. That was with their old drop system, now it is harder to make the money.
[/quote]

They are like 500gp now, not 1k like they were a year ago[/quote]

I think I paid around 450 each.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 range
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I don’t really have experience here, but I agree with the others. You probably should get halfway to 99 (~92-93) before using chins. It’ll save a lot of money in the long-run. Plus, if you follow what rip4d said, you’d make upwards of 50m from tzhaar, easily paying for the chins to 99. I think that’s a good deal.

Read full topic

Spades:

I trained at Tzhaar from 30-75 from 75-88 I trained at Steel/Iron dragons from 88-99 which was about a year ago cost me over 50M in chins and pots. I earned it all back but I pked for it all back, I earned it back within a week. That was with their old drop system, now it is harder to make the money.

They are like 500gp now, not 1k like they were a year ago

item.title: 99 range
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Train in TzHaar like I did from 59-90. With the tokkul rates now, getting an Onyx only takes about ~40 hours. 40 hours x 40k xp = 1.6M xp and 16M cash

Read full topic

item.title: 99 range
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Spades:

Chinning is the biggest waste of money if you are -90 range.

Range is also the biggest waste of time to train i hate to train it and i’ve got the money to waste lol, so i figured im just going to chin to 99

Read full topic
